name: TrulyNet
tag_list: reviews, gadget, blog, writing, editorial, magazine, new-york, nyc, manhattan
overview:
TrulyNet is a New York City-based web network, offering critical commentary and reviews of the latest gear. Founded in 2005, and formerly based in Honolulu and San Francisco, they have grown from a single site to almost a dozen.

With niche sites like TrulyGadgets.com and TrulyFashions.com, the TrulyNetwork updates daily, bringing the largely young professional audience news and advice covering products from kitchen appliances to outdoor necessities.

Founded in 2005 by Editor-in-Chief Greg May, TrulyNet has staff located in four states.
